article.title: RNA Vaccines
article.author: Tom Rodrigues
article.excerpt: Developing vaccines usually takes a long time, but during a pandemic, time is at a premium. RNA vaccines might be the solution.

authors.bio: Hey, I’m Tom. Check out my posts, I’m sure you’ll find something interesting…
authors.name: Tom Rodrigues
